name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in creating REST APIs and implementing microservices utilizing **Express**, and skilled in CI/CD practices with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**. Mastery of frontend frameworks like **React.js** alongside a solid understanding of backend technologies.

Expert in deploying cloud-native applications and managing infrastructure with **Terraform**. Adept at building scalable, compliant solutions aligned with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven experience in AI/ML platform development, leveraging tools like **Redis** for caching and data management. Recognized for strong collaboration skills and delivering projects on time and within budget.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable and secure applications utilizing **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **Python** frameworks, ensuring efficiency and performance across 15+ microservices.
• Implemented RESTful APIs using **Express** and integrated third-party services, ensuring high availability and low latency for APIs serving over **100,000** users monthly.
• Managed cloud infrastructure on **AWS** utilizing services like **AWS Lambda**, ensuring cost-effective solutions with a **30%** reduction in operational costs.
• Orchestrated containerized deployments using **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, achieving automated rollouts and rollbacks across multiple environments, improving deployment time by **40%**.
• Designed and optimized databases with **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, supporting complex queries and scalable data solutions for high-throughput applications.
• Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines leveraging **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, enabling rapid deployment cycles and reducing integration times by **50%**.
• Collaborated in designing front-end applications using **React.js**, providing an intuitive interface that increased user engagement metrics by **25%**.
• Enforced robust testing strategies across the stack with **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest**, establishing a testing coverage threshold of **85%** for production code.
• Engaged in architectural enhancements to incorporate best practices for security and compliance across the development lifecycle.
• Provided mentorship and guidance to junior developers on utilizing modern frameworks and tools, leading to improved team productivity and collaboration.

Utilized **TypeScript** to develop and maintain scalable applications, ensuring high-quality code and efficient performance in line with the company’s technical standards.
Implemented backend services leveraging **Node.js** (Express) and **Python** (Django/FastAPI) to build robust APIs, enhancing system integration and data retrieval processes.
Designed and optimized relational database solutions using **PostgreSQL**, ensuring data integrity and high availability for applications supporting over **10,000** concurrent users.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, streamlining the deployment process and reducing release times by **30%**.
Deployed containerized applications using **Kubernetes**, enhancing system reliability and scalability as traffic surged by **50%** during peak periods.
Developed user interfaces with **React** (v18) and **Redux Toolkit** to create dynamic, user-friendly applications, meeting the needs of over **5,000** users across various devices.
Executed infrastructure as code (IaC) with **Terraform** for efficient environment provisioning and management, achieving consistent deployment across multiple environments.
Incorporated asynchronous message queuing using **Redis** and **RabbitMQ** for real-time processing, ensuring quick and reliable communication between microservices.
Led the creation of RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems, enhancing the overall customer experience for financial services.
Worked extensively with third-party tools such as **AWS** and **Nginx** to enhance application performance, security, and monitoring, resulting in improved operational efficiency.

Utilized **TypeScript** and **Node.js** (with **Express**) to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and low latency across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Developed and deployed applications in **Python** (using **Django** and **FastAPI**) and **JavaScript** (with **React.js**) to enhance user experience and system performance for both web and mobile platforms.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking with a user satisfaction rate increase of **25%**.
Leveraged **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for distributed data storage, achieving a **30%** improvement in data access times for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, while caching frequently accessed resources for better performance.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **TensorFlow** and **scikit-learn**, contributing to a **15%** improvement in conversion rates through personalized product listings based on real-time behavior.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata and search results, significantly enhancing application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases by **40%**.
Developed CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** to streamline deployments, resulting in a **50%** reduction in deployment times through automated testing and rollbacks.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs with **React.js**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), leading to increased engagement by **20%**.
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, adhering to PCI compliance and enhancing security for financial transactions through robust tokenized systems.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for enhanced security, ensuring GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
